an10.193:4.1: “I will teach you the principle to activate and the principle not to activate. …
an10.193:4.3: And what is the principle not to activate?
an10.193:4.6: This is called the principle not to activate.
an10.193:5.1: And what is the principle to activate?
an10.193:5.4: This is called the principle to activate.”
